Uses of Class
ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher.HasherBase

  • Packages that use HasherBase 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher
    Concrete hashers.

    • Uses of HasherBase in ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher

      Subclasses of HasherBase in ml.alternet.security.auth.hasher 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Argon2Hasher
      The Argon2 hasher.
      class  BCryptHasher
      The BCrypt hasher.
      static class  BCryptHasher.Digest
      BCrypt truncate passwords to 72 bytes, and some other minor quirks.
      class  MD5BasedHasher
      The MD5 based BSD password algorithm 1 and apr1 (Apache variant).
      class  MessageHasher
      The hasher is based on Java's message digests.
      class  PBKDF1Hasher 
      class  PBKDF2Hasher
      A slightly modified PBKDF2 hasher, that erase intermediate data.
      class  PlainTextHasher
      Just encode the chars with the charset supplied without hashing ; DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION.
      class  SaltedMessageHasher
      Compute a checksum as the raw digest of the the string {password}{salt}.
      class  SHA2Hasher
      The SHA-256/512 hash algorithms in a libc6 crypt() compatible way.
      class  UnixCryptHasher
      The Unix Crypt hasher.
